categoryDescription: Minigames to play with other members

coinflip.side: Woah! The coin landed on it's side!

counting.description: Set up a counting channel where members can show their math skills!

channel.description: The channel you want to add (or remove, if already added) as a counting channel.

added.embedTitle: This channel is now a counting channel!
added.embedDescription:
The rules are simple:
> Start with **1**.
> Add **1** to the last number
> You can't count two numbers in a row
Have fun!
added.success: I successfully added <#{channel}> as a counting channel.

removed.embedDescription: This channel is no longer a counting channel!
removed.success: I successfully removed <#{channel}> as a counting channel.

mgstats.description: get stats about one of the bot's minigames

user.description: get stats about yourself or a specific user

game.description: Wich game do you want to get stats about?

target.description: Wich user do you want to get stats about?

leaderboard.description: get the top 10 players of a game

game.description: Wich game do you want to get stats about?

mgstats.missingGameArg: You need to give me a `game` as the first argument!
mgstats.notFound:
This is not a valid game entry. Valid games are:
`{list}`
mgstats.noPlayers: It looks like no one has played yet...
mgstats.youNoGamesPlayed: You have not played any {game} games yet.
mgstats.userNoGamesPlayed: {user} has not played any {game} games yet.

rps.description: Play rock paper scissors against your friends or the bot

opponent.description: Who do you want to play against?

challenge.botEmbedDescription: You have challenged me to a duel!

rps.memberNotFound: At least one of the players has not been found!
rps.declined: :x: `{opponent}` did not rise up to the challenge.

end.alreadyChosen: You have already selected {move}! Please wait for your opponent to choose.
end.tie: No one won the game, it's a tie! {emoji} = {emoji}

tictactoe.description: play TicTacToe against a friend or the bot
